price: Twaranahoneje Bene Aadi barungikiwe Hudi, Bene Thamuudi barungikiwe Swalehe na Beniriba, hamwe rero n’iyindi migwi myinshi y’abantu yagiye irabaho hagati y’iyo migwi, ikagarariza Intumwa yarungikiwe;
arabic: وَعَادٗا وَثَمُودَاْ وَأَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلرَّسِّ وَقُرُونَۢا بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ كَثِيرٗا

meta.transliteration: waʿādan wathamūdā wa-aṣḥāba al-rasi waqurūnan bayna dhālika kathīran
